data.name: Shapelab
data.detailed_description:
Shapelab’s intuitive interface and extensive toolset make it an easy-to-use app for creating organic shapes from simple forms to complex designs. Visualise your creative ideas and print them in 3D or sculpt high quality props, characters and concepts for applications, games, and virtual worlds as well as digital concept art and storyboards.

Shapelab’s usage of polygons instead of voxels makes it stand out in the creative VR tools market. Polygonal mesh modeling gives you the ability to sculpt stunning, well-detailed and realistic 3D assets.

Step into our virtual lab and unleash your creativity!

CORE FEATURES:

Brushes and tools
Paint brush, Paint bucket, Mask brush, Standard brush, Clay buildup/carve, SnakeHook, Move tool, Inflate/Deflate, Pinch/Crease, Flatten, Trim, Smooth, Regularize, Boolean, 3D Stamp and Cut, Surface stamp

Brush modifiers
- Size, Strength, Falloff, Resolution (tessellation), Alphas, Brush shapes, Steady stroke, Rotate along drag and various other constraints and modifiers

Multi-resolution vs Fixed resolution Sculpting
- Turn dynamic resolution sculpting on/off

Global topology manipulation and transform
- Voxel remesh, Mirror and weld, Subdivide, Decimate, Regularize

Polygon editing
- Removing, deleting and separating meshes and polygons

Multi-object handling
- Import, Export and manipulate objects separately
- Clone, Mirror, Merge, Subtract, Intersect, Join objects

Environments and materials
- Numerous realistic materials and diverse environments to choose from

Import/export
- Import/export FBX, OBJ, STL and GLB files

data.short_description: Shapelab by Leopoly is a VR design application offering a variety of powerful polygon mesh-based sculpting tools, for both aspiring creatives and experienced 3D artists. Step into our virtual lab and release your creativity, make your own models, and perfect your ideas through digital sculpting!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
